creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: gallery installation piece; 550 total pieces--porcelain chopstick rests with hexagonal cross-sections and slightly tapered centers: unglazed with face drawn on one end in black marker, clear/white glazed with face in blue underglaze on one end, red glazed with white face on one end, green glazed with white face on one end, gold glazed with black face on one end, black glazed with white face (incised in black glaze) on one end; four boxes of black sand; see Notes for inventory break-down
medium: Glazed and unglazed porcelain, black sand
title: Today's Faces of Judgement
